author: Sarah O'Brien
title: Can't keep up with insurance premiums? Here's what to do
description: A handful of states are requiring insurers to provide extra time for consumers to make those payments without facing cancellation of their policies, and many insurance companies are providing relief even if not required to.
content:
Under normal circumstances, failure to pay any type of insurance premium results in a loss of coverage fairly quickly.
These aren't normal times.
In addition to insurance companies offering relief to customers who are struggling to pay their premiums, a han… [+3215 chars]
